title: S1: audioBoom Q&A Pt.4: Susan Simpson
description:
Susan Simpson answers listener questions about the case of Adnan Syed. This interview includes questions from Emily Lewis, Tim Christian and Tom Olson.

Produced for AudioBoom by Jeremy Helton and Carl Scott. Music by @thesonicdrifter
